oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plan of Fort Ontario built at Oswego in 1759.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rivez, Charles.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Manuscript maps.; Gage Maps.; Brun Guide.; Maps shelf.; Fort Ontario (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Oswego (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; New York (State)--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Signed: Surveid and done by Charles Rivez acting as engineer.; Key identifies buildings and other features.; Includes section through ditch, wall and barracks.
